title: The Intelligent Octopus
description: Octopuses are cephalopods known for their high intelligence, eight arms, and remarkable ability to change color and texture for camouflage.

questions.question: What is unique about an octopus's blood?
How many hearts does an octopus have?
Which of these is a form of defense for an octopus?
What is the primary way an octopus moves?
options: By using its tentacles to pull itself

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of octopuses?
